wiki-page.author: admin
wiki-page.content:
1 Fix Time
#set($maxWeeks = 20)
The graph shows number of change requests implemented in NUM weeks after the creation. I.e. items where ResolvedOn-CreatedOn = X weeks
#set($sqlItems="SELECT WI.C_PK FROM WORKITEM WI, PROJECT PROJECT WHERE WI.FK_URI_PROJECT = PROJECT.C_URI AND PROJECT.C_ID = '$page.project' AND WI.C_TYPE='changerequest' AND WI.C_STATUS='verified-done' ") #set($itemsSize = $trackerService.dataService.sqlSearch($sqlItems).size())
#if($itemsSize==0 ) #info("No Change Requests tracked") #else
#set($itemsPer="0") #set($items="0") #set($category="0")
#macro (searchInWeeks $weeks) #set($days = ($weeks * 7)) #set($daysBefore = $days - 8) #set($sqlDatePart="AND (cast(WI.C_RESOLVEDON as date) - cast(WI.C_CREATED as date))<$days AND (cast(WI.C_RESOLVEDON as date) - cast(WI.C_CREATED as date))>$daysBefore") #set($num = $trackerService.dataService.sqlSearch("$sqlItems $sqlDatePart").size()) #set($items = "$!items:$num") #set($fl = $num * 100 / $itemsSize ) #set($itemsPer = "$!itemsPer:$fl") #set($category = "$!category:$weeks week(s) ") #end
#macro (searchInDays $d) #set($days = $d + 1) #set($daysBefore = $days - 2) #set($sqlDatePart="AND (cast(WI.C_RESOLVEDON as date) - cast(WI.C_CREATED as date))<$days AND (cast(WI.C_RESOLVEDON as date) - cast(WI.C_CREATED as date))>$daysBefore") #set($num = $trackerService.dataService.sqlSearch("$sqlItems $sqlDatePart").size()) #set($items = "$!items:$num") #set($fl = $num * 100 / $hiAll ) #set($itemsPer = "$!itemsPer:$fl") #set($category = "$!category:$d days(s)") #end
#macro (searchMoreWeeks $weeks) #set($days = ($weeks * 7) ) #set($sqlDatePart="AND (cast(WI.C_RESOLVEDON as date) - cast(WI.C_CREATED as date))>$days") #set($num = $trackerService.dataService.sqlSearch("$sqlItems $sqlDatePart").size()) #set($items = "$!items:$num") #set($num = $num * 100 / $hiAll) #set($itemsPer = "$!itemsPer:$num") #set($category = "$!category:More") #end
#foreach($i in [1..$maxWeeks]) #searchInWeeks($i) #end #searchMoreWeeks($maxWeeks)
#highchartStart("Percentage of Change Requests impemented in weeks" "areaspline" 800 500) #set($highchartColors = ["FF5904","99cc99"]) #setHighchartCategories("$category") #if($itemsSize!=0)#addHighchartDataSet("% Change Requests" "$itemsPer")#end #addHighchartAdditionalOptions("options.plotOptions ={areaspline: {animation: false}};") #addHighchartAdditionalOptions("options.xAxis.labels = {rotation: -40, y: 10, style:{fontSize:'9px'}};") #addHighchartAdditionalOptions("options.yAxis = {min:0,title:{text:'Percentage'}};") #highchartEnd()
#highchartStart("Num of change requests implemented in weeks" "areaspline" 800 500) #set($highchartColors = ["FF5904","99cc99"]) #setHighchartCategories("$category") #if($itemsSize!=0)#addHighchartDataSet("Change Requests" "$items")#end #addHighchartAdditionalOptions("options.plotOptions ={areaspline: {animation: false}};") #addHighchartAdditionalOptions("options.xAxis.labels = {rotation: -40, y: 10, style:{fontSize:'9px'}};") #addHighchartAdditionalOptions("options.yAxis = {min:0,title:{text:'Number of change requests'}};") #highchartEnd()
#end
